lead_paragraph: Damian Lillard scored 31 points and the Portland Trail Blazers won for the 16th time in 20 games, beating the short-handed Chicago Bulls 103-95 on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Lillard Scores 31 Points as Trail Blazers Beat Bulls 103-95
headline.main: Lillard Scores 31 Points as Trail Blazers Beat Bulls 103-95

snippet: Damian Lillard scored 31 points and the Portland Trail Blazers won for the 16th time in 20 games, beating the short-handed Chicago Bulls 103-95 on Saturday night....
